reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan to be of good quality, lightweight, and true to size, with one mentioning the hood is roomy enough to cover their eyes. They appreciate its versatility, noting it's perfect for traveling on planes and can be worn with various outfits, from joggers to jeans. Customers describe the material as super nice and thick, and find it comfortable, soft, and put together in style.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hoodigan. See my review for sizing.
items.body: I'm going to write a review I wish had been written and read to help me decide what size to order when I first ordered this hoodigan. I normally wear a 2xl women's in all my tops. I am a 42DDD with an average size waist. I'm 5'5" and 175lbs. I ordered a 2xl from the Sketchers store/website first. It was way too big on me. (Yes I went by the sizing chart) Another strange thing (which may have been a sewing error) was that the hood itself was HUGE! Lol! It draped over my head and it went over my face just past my nose! I was on the fence as to keep or not. Glad I returned it. I decided to see what was on Amazon and see if there was a Skechers hoodigan in just an XL. Even better, found one for less on sale! (I returned the 2XL hoodigan.) This one is a perfect size for my shape. The products fabric is great! Not too heavy, not too light. Especially if you tend to " run too warm or get hot flashes". The hood wasn't too large either. It was appropriately sized! So glad about that. I also bought some cardigan/shawl clips to use when I want a controlled closure on windy days since its an open style of jacket. I plan on many many years of use with this quality sewn, luscious fabric hoodigan! Read more
items.author: Mary I. Nolletti

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy
items.body: Love this for around the house. Very comfy and lightweight. Read more
items.author: Mbm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my athleisure wear
items.body: This jacket is perfect for spring! It can be worn with anything from joggers to jeans to nicer pants. It's very soft and fits true to size. The fabric is very thin (not in a bad way) so I'll be wearing it in warmer temperatures. Great Skechers quality. Read more
items.author: Laura V.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice!
items.body: Very nice but made a little on the large size. I’m also only 5’3” so if you are short it will be a little long Would recommend but may want to size down Read more
items.author: Debbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Any Occasion
items.body: I bought this before a spring trip to Paris so that I wouldn't have to wear my thick hoodie everywhere. I knew the temperatures would be in the 50s and 60s Farenheit while we were there and there would probably be some rain. This sweater was a total rock star. *The hood is roomy enough to cover my eyes when we were on long car rides and I wanted to rest, but didn't blind me when I had it up while walking around *The pockets are big enough for my hands when I was cold or for my phone *It's long enough that it actually keeps you warm *It's lightweight enough that I didn't feel claustrophobic wearing it *The material wicks moisture really well - it kept me dry in light, misty rains, and dried in minutes after getting caught in a deluge *The sleeves are wide enough for my, ahem, "bingo arms" *I wore it over a dress for our fancy lunch and it looked fine. Also goes with jeans and t-shirts. *Not a pain in the butt to carry around when the weather warmed up Overall, one of the best purchases I've ever made. While it won't replace a warmer hoodie or sweatshirt, it gets the job done when you just need a little protection from a chill. It's become my go-to late spring/early fall piece of outerwear. Read more
items.author: Meredith M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: Love this! It’s so comfortable and I can wear it anywhere. I’ve gotten compliments on it and would recommend it. Be careful with large rings as it snags easy when putting it on Read more
items.author: MARYANN SIEBERT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best jacket
items.body: A friend told me about the jacket. No close on it, so it hangs. I can slip it over anything. It has both pockets on each side. Fits great and looks great. Light weight, soft and love sketchers. Read more
items.author: Tiffany

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Luv it, nice weight heavier than I expected, good quality, warm, great for cool nights & cool mornings or just for spring, fits perfectly, nice length I’m 5’ 5” size medium, look nice with everything, will order another color… Read more
items.author: Jennifer

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Green, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
